mapper.insert: insert into biz_publish_message_info (id, client_id, username, topic, qos, payload, receive_time) values (#{id}, #{client_id}, #{username}, #{topic}, #{qos}, #{payload}, #{receive_time})
mapper.select:
select messageInfo.id, messageInfo.client_id, messageInfo.username, messageInfo.topic, messageInfo.qos, messageInfo.payload, messageInfo.receive_time, topic_msg from biz_publish_message_info messageInfo left join dict_publish_topic_info topicInfo on messageInfo.topic= topicInfo.topic where 1=1
and messageInfo.client_id like concat('%',#{client_id},'%')
and messageInfo.username like concat('%',#{username},'%')
and messageInfo.topic like concat('%',#{topic},'%')
order by messageInfo.receive_time desc
